segments.text: Excuse me , is this where I can catch a bus to the museum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're at the right stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got small change ? They require exact fare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I've got some coins . How much is the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One yuan . When you get on the front of the bus , just drop your money into the box .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How often does this bus run at this time of day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It runs every ten minutes . Oh , here comes the bus .
segments.speaker: S2
